Text.Page:
I don't know what the Scions are up to down there, but they've got a lot of demonic allies. Imps, to be precise.

If the Scions can bind demons to do their work, it'll make them tougher to defeat. Head into the bastion and kill the Scions' imps.

You succeeded? Splendid!

I can't stand demons, even the little ones. We're well rid of them.
